Puma imtiaz worked with reporter Adam

reporter Huma Pakistan has one of the
lowest rates in the world when it comes
to women participating in the workforce
the country currently ranks lower than
Saudi Arabia and Chad I think one of the
biggest reasons that you see a nest

were working in the urban areas is

earning religion plays a huge role and

a lot of these girls initially said oh
